participant_1.background:
I love to go to a local cafe with my family and have a nice meal together.
i am pretty poor financially.
i like going to canada.
I love trying new foods from different cultures, but my favorite type of food is comfort food.
I like to bake, but it's a secret from my parents.

participant_2.background:
I'm maintaining a healthy weight by surfing often and eating a balanced diet.
I like to sharpen my blade and practice my sword skills in my free time.
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.
my sister is becoming my mother and often asks me when i m getting married.

content.text: Hi there! I'm trying to get a new perspective on life, so I'm asking people random questions. How do you like to spend your free time?
Hi! I like to stay active by surfing and hiking. I also enjoy learning about the universe and everything in it.
That sounds really interesting! I love to try new foods from different cultures. What's your favorite type of food?
I'm a big fan of comfort food. It's easy to make and it always feels good. I also love seafood.
Me too! I have a secret hobby of baking. I love to try new recipes and share them with my family.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to bake. Maybe you can teach me sometime.
I'd be happy to! I'm sure your sister would love to try some of your baked goods too.
Thanks! She's always nagging me to get married, so I think this would be a great way to show her I'm a good cook.
Haha, that's a great idea! I'm sure she'll love it.
